column1:
header <- dashboardHeader(title = "Gender Gap Analysis")

sidebar <- dashboardSidebar(
    sidebarMenu(
        menuItem(text = "Gap Earnings", tabName = "gap"),
        menuItem(text = "Distribution Plot", tabName = "dist"),
        menuItem(text = "Data", tabName = "dat"),
        selectInput(inputId = "tahun", 
                    label = "Choose Year:", 
                    choices = unique(workers_clean$year))
    ))

body <- dashboardBody(
    tabItems(
        tabItem(tabName = "gap", plotlyOutput("plot_ranking")),
        tabItem(tabName = "dist",
                radioButtons(inputId = "corrid",
                             label = "Choose Numerical Variable",
                             choiceNames  = str_to_title(str_replace_all(names(select_if(workers_clean[,-1], 
                                                                                         is.numeric)),"_"," ")),
                             choiceValues = names(select_if(workers_clean[,-1], is.numeric))
                ), 
                plotlyOutput("corr_plot")),
        
        tabItem(tabName = "dat", dataTableOutput(outputId = "dataset"))
    ))


dashboardPage(
    header = header,
    body = body,
    sidebar = sidebar)
